name: Sidechain
description:
Sidechain is a crazily addictive arcade game that stimulate your brain and reflexes. Tap left or right based on the box shown on the conveyor belt. Be fast!

How long can you survive?

-------------------------

"This game is awesome it's the perfect amount of difficulty where you don't want to quit after 100 tries" - Tmaibfgg

"I've never made a review for a game before, but this one deserve it. It's tons of fun with just the right amount of difficulty to keep you interested and not frustrated. Very simple, but that's what makes it work." - Warrior289n

"It's so good guys you should so get this game it's amaz-balls" - Peanutcutie316

"I have three of their games and I am enjoying playing all of them!" - Bradley Baum

-------------------------

** As seen on iPhone Life magazine **
** From the maker of Zig Zag Boom & Boom Dots **
** Recommended for fans of casual aracade game like Timberman & Piano Tiles **
